Draconic Form.name: Draconic Form
Draconic Form.flavor: Your body grows larger, with scales spreading across your body and dragonâ€™s wings emerging from your back. You have become the dragon whose soul resides within your body.
Draconic Form.effect: You assume the form of an ancient dragon until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your size becomes Huge, your reach increases to 3 squares, and you gain a fly speed equal to your speed +2. Until the end of the encounter, you can use Draconic Form Attack as an at-will power.
Draconic Form.requirement: The power Draconic Form must be active in order to use this power.
Draconic Form.attack: Your highest ability score +9 vs. Reflex
Draconic Form.onHit: 3d8 + your highest ability modifier fire and force damage.
